typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SEQ as string,
		NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		EXTENSION as string,
		MOBILE as string,
		ENTITYCR as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> stgwarehouseerrorlog
stgwarehouseerrorlog derive(DS_FILENAME = replace(DS_FILENAME,'.','_warehouse_err.')) ~> dsfilename
dsfilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DS_FILENAME',
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		MainorBranch,
		CompanyNameArabic,
		CompanyNameEnglish,
		CommercialRegistrationNo,
		CommercialLicensenumber,
		Area,
		StreetName,
		AreaNumber,
		StreetNumber2,
		BuildingNumber,
		PhoneNumber,
		Fax,
		Box = {P.O.Box},
		Email,
		Website,
		MapLocationUrl,
		DS_ERROR_CODE
	)) ~> errorlogwarehouse
